      Books rooms in this hotel with the given requirements.

      Cancels bookings in any room of this hotel with the given booking ID.

      Returns the name of the hotel.

      Checks if this Hotel has the required number of Rooms available on the specified dates ignoring the booking with the given ID.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Hotel

        public Hotel(java.lang.String name)
        Creates a new Hotel object. Contains an empty ArrayList of rooms.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the new hotel as a string.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the name of the hotel.
        Returns:
        The name of the hotel as a string.

      • makeNewRoom

        public void makeNewRoom(int roomNumber,
               int capacity)
        Makes a new room in this hotel with the given room number and capacity.
        Parameters:
        roomNumber - The number of the room as an int.
        capacity - The capacity of the room as an int. This capacity ranges from 1 (single) to 3 (triple).

      • isAvailable

        public boolean isAvailable(int capacity,
                  java.lang.String month,
                  int startDate,
                  int duration,
                  int numberRooms)
        Checks if this Hotel has the required number of Rooms available on the specified dates.
        Parameters:
        capacity - The capacity of the Room as an int. This capacity ranges from 1 (single) to 3 (triple).
        month - The month of the booking as a 3-letter string.
        startDate - The date the booking starts on as an int.
        duration - The length of the booking as an int.
        numberRooms - The number of rooms to book of the given capacity.
        Returns:
        boolean indicating if rooms are available in this Hotel.

      • isChangeAvailable

        public boolean isChangeAvailable(int capacity,
                        java.lang.String month,
                        int startDate,
                        int duration,
                        int numberRooms,
                        int bookingID)
        Checks if this Hotel has the required number of Rooms available on the specified dates ignoring the booking with the given ID.
        Parameters:
        capacity - The capacity of the Room as an int. This capacity ranges from 1 (single) to 3 (triple).
        month - The month of the booking as a 3-letter string.
        startDate - The date the booking starts on as an int.
        duration - The length of the booking as an int.
        numberRooms - The number of rooms to book of the given capacity.
        bookingID - The ID of the booking to ignore as an int.
        Returns:
        boolean indicating if rooms are available in this Hotel.

      • bookRooms

        public void bookRooms(int bookingID,
             int capacity,
             java.lang.String month,
             int startDate,
             int duration,
             int numberRooms)
        Books rooms in this hotel with the given requirements. Rooms are booked in order of input.
        Parameters:
        bookingID - The ID of the booking as an int.
        capacity - The capacity of the booking as an int. This capacity ranges from 1 (single) to 3 (triple).
        month - The month of the booking as a 3-letter string.
        startDate - The date that the booking begins on as an int.
        duration - The length of the booking as an int.
        numberRooms - The number of rooms to book as an int.

      • printBookedRooms

        public void printBookedRooms(int bookingID,
                    java.lang.String month,
                    int startDate,
                    java.lang.String hotelName)
        Prints out booked rooms associated with a particular booking ID in the hotel in the format " bookingID hotelName roomNumber1 roomNumber2 ...".
        Parameters:
        bookingID - The ID of the booking as an int.
        month - The month of the booking as a 3-letter string.
        startDate - The date the booking begins on as an int.
        hotelName - The name of the hotel as a string.

      • cancelBooking

        public void cancelBooking(int bookingID)
        Cancels bookings in any room of this hotel with the given booking ID.
        Parameters:
        bookingID - The ID of the booking as an int.

      • print

        public void print()
        Prints out each room and their bookings in this Hotel in the format "hotelName roomNumber bookingMonth1 bookingDate1 duration1 bookingMonth2 bookingDate2 duration2". For example, "Surfers 101 Jan 23 3 Jan 27 2".
